author: Masashi Kishimoto
description: A young ninja's journey to become the strongest ninja and leader of his village.
title: Naruto

author: Hajime Isayama
description: In a world where humanity resides within enormous walled cities to protect themselves from Titans, gigantic humanoid creatures.
title: Attack on Titan

author: Haruo Sotozaki
description: Tanjiro Kamado's quest to avenge his family and save his sister from demons.
title: Demon Slayer

author: Sunghoo Park
description: Yuji Itadori's journey to battle curses and save his friends after encountering a cursed talisman.
title: Jujutsu Kaisen

author: Kyōhei Ishiguro
description: A piano prodigy's journey to find the true meaning of music and love after meeting a free-spirited violinist.
title: Your Lie in April

author: Katsuyuki Motohiro
description: In a dystopian future, society is governed by a system that measures the mental state of individuals.
title: Psycho Pass

author: Kazuhiro Furuhashi
description: A ronin and a young orphan with prosthetic limbs seek revenge against demons in feudal Japan.
title: Dororo

author: Kunihiko Ikuhara
description: Utena Tenjou's journey in the surreal and symbolic dueling academy to revolutionize the world.
title: Revolutionary Girl Utena

author: Tatsuya Ishihara
description: Tomoya Okazaki's journey through high school, exploring friendship, family, and love.
title: Clannad

author: Tatsuyuki Nagai
description: A group of friends reunite and confront their past after the ghost of their deceased friend returns.
title: Anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day

author: Tatsuyuki Nagai
description: Ryuuji Takasu and Taiga Aisaka navigate the challenges of high school and discover love.
title: Toradora!

author: Makoto Shinkai
description: Taki and Mitsuha, two strangers, find themselves mysteriously connected through their dreams.
title: Your Name

author: Kōnosuke Uda
description: A comedic love story about a tall girl and a short guy navigating high school life and relationships.
title: Lovely★Complex

description: A transfer student discovers a mysterious and deadly curse that haunts his new class.
title: Another

description: Kaneki Ken, a college student turned half-ghoul, struggles to survive in a world where ghouls and humans coexist.
title: Tokyo Ghoul

description: A series of mysterious attacks by a bat-wielding assailant plunge the city into chaos.
title: Paranoia Agent

description: A brilliant surgeon pursues a young psychopath he once saved, now on a killing spree.
title: Monster

description: Light Yagami gains a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone whose name he writes.
title: Death Note

description: Participants in a psychological game must outsmart each other to win a large sum of money.
title: Liar Game

description: "BLAME!" follows Killy, a lone wanderer in a dystopian future, as he navigates a colossal and chaotic structure called "the City" in search of the Net Terminal Gene. Amidst relentless dangers, he seeks to bring order to the sprawling, techno-organic labyrinth and save humanity from extinction.
title: Blame!

description: Guts, a lone mercenary, seeks sanctuary from demonic forces in a dark and medieval world.
title: Berserk

description: Kei Kurono and others are resurrected to participate in a deadly game against alien invaders.
title: Gantz

description: A town is cursed by supernatural events related to spirals.
title: Uzumaki

description: A collection of short stories exploring various urban legends and creepy occurrences.
title: Fuan no Tane

author: Yoshitoki Ōima
description: Shoya Ishida seeks redemption after bullying a deaf classmate, Shoko Nishimiya, in elementary school.
title: A Silent Voice

author: Chika Umino
description: Professional shogi player Rei Kiriyama navigates the challenges of his personal and professional life.
title: March Comes in Like a Lion
